intro: Pycreus overlaetii, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to Africa. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its velvety, dark green leaves and showy, tubular flowers. The plant typically grows in shaded, humid environments and prefers well-draining soil. It is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements. Pycreus overlaetii blooms in shades of purple, pink, and white, adding a vibrant touch to indoor spaces.
